question:
II.    Fill in the blanks with the correct answers
16. Mrs. Natan is pretty ....... (guru)
17. Diligent means in Indonesia is......
18. Smart mean in Indonesia is
19. Clever mean in Indonesia is
A Rajin
B Teacher
C Pintar
D Drinks
E Tree
F Is
G GO
20. She .......
a diligent girl
21. They ........... to the library by bus
22. Shinta ..........
...... milk every morning
H Memasak
23. What can you see in the park?
24. My mother likes cook
I Kerja
J cerdas
Cook in Indonesia is .....
25. My father likes go to work
Work in Indonesia is .......
Text for question number 1-5​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

16. pretty teacher

17. rajin

18. pandai / cerdas

19. pintar

20. she is

21. went

22. drink

23. ini gatau gw

24. memasak

25. bekerja

semoga terbantu ya✌

related_questions.question:
34. A. go B. went C. going D. gone    35. A. stay B. stays C. staying D. stayed

36. A. enjoy B. enjoyed C. enjoying D. enjoys

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

34. B. Went

35. D. Stayed

36. B. Enjoyed

Penjelasan: Simple Past Tense menggunakan kata kerja bentuk ke dua atau Verb 2

go-went

stay-stayed

enjoy-enjoyed

hope you find this helpful^•^

Jawaban:

34.went

35stayed

36enjoyed

Penjelasan:

semua dlm bentuk simple past tense krn sdh lampau

related_questions.question:
6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?    a. Is
b. am
c. was
d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now
a. is 
b. Are 
c. Am
d. Be

Pliss bantu Lagi Kakak Besok ujian saya harus di kumpul​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?

a. Is

b. am

c. was

d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now

a. is

b. Are

c. Am

d. Be

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Present Continuous Tense. Nomor 6. karena subjeknya Mary, maka Tobe nya adalah a. is.

Nomor 7. karena subjeknya Susan dan Susanna, maka Tobe nya adalah b. are.

Semoga membantu ya.

cmiiw

related_questions.question: The shop...late yesterday a. closed B. close C closes d. closing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. closed

Penjelasan:

Kenapa yang closed? Karena disitu udah ada kata yesterday yang dimana artinya kemarin sehingga harus menggunakan Past Tense yang dimana past tense ini verbnya (kata kerja) menggunakan bentuk kedua.

related_questions.question: My name is irene. i am twenty one years old. i am tall and slim. my hair is black and curly. my nose is sharp and my skin is white. i work for a big company in semarang. my job is to make a minute in meeting, type letters, manage the director’s daily agenda and select guest who want to meet my director. what does her hair look like?

related_questions.question:
13. Lani    : Lara, your bag is cool. It has simple design but luxurious. It's awesome.
Lara : Thanks. My father bought it for me yesterday,
From the dialog we know that ...
A. Lara's bag is new
B. Lani dislikes the bag
C. the bag is expensive
D. Lara bought the bag yesterday.​
Kk tolong di jawab sekarang ya mks​

answers.answer:

9. c

10. b

11. b

nmr 7 sama 8 tidak ada teksnya
